text: Simon Barere (1 September 1896 â€“ 2 April 1951) was a Russian pianist. He was born in Odesa, Ukraine. Barere died of a massive bleeding in brain during a performance of Grieg's Piano Concerto at Carnegie Hall with Philadelphia Orchestra. ==Other websites== * Simon Barere's Liszt, Rachmaninoff, Balakirev, Chopin on Remington Records.
